name: Foguete
description:
Time to win this war as a one man/jet/rocket army.

FOGUETE is an action packed flight arcade game where the only way to destroy your enemies is by turning yourself into a missile and completely losing controls over your movements. You can only regain the reins of your jet once you destroy an enemy.

  • How to Play:
    • If you collide with an enemy aircraft, or leave the battlefield, you lose the game;
    • To damage enemies, turn your jet into a rocket, which destroy other aircrafts;
    • BE CAREFUL, once you enter rocket mode, you lose all control of your movement, and can only turn into a jet again after destroying at least one enemy.
  • Controls:
    • WASD movement
    • SPACEBAR to become rocket

Game made in 48 hours for GMTKJam 2020.

Music made by the awesome @kikitojoseprof!

Developers:

Rafael Vital @rafavla32
